translations: 生物标记；生物指标（biomarker 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Much research is focused on identifying more biomarkers.
sentences.translation: 许多研究都集中在辨别更多的生物标志。

sentences.sentence: That work was in the July issue of Cancer Epidemiology, Biomarkers & Prevention.
sentences.translation: 这项研究发表在6月份的《癌症流行病学、生物标记物与预防》上。

sentences.sentence: The study was recently published in Cancer Epidemiology, Biomarkers & Prevention.
sentences.translation: 该研究最近发表在杂志《癌症流行病学，生物标记与预防》上。
